DOC.brief_title: Safety Same Day Discharge After Elective Percutaneous Coronary Intervention
DOC.criteria: : Low risk lesion ( accord ACC classification ) Normal Pre Catheterization laboratory investigation Procedure perform 3 pm procedure perform ≤ 6 French guide Catheter EF ≥ 35 % living distance within 15 kilometer hospital caregiver present home elective procedure Acute PCI high risk lesion ( accord ACC classification ) derange Pre Catheterization laboratory investigation Age > 70 Severe LV dysfunction , CVA procedure perform guide catheter > 6F Use IIb/IIIa inhibitor Creatinine clearance < 50
